title: BBC Local Live: Essex on Wednesday, 29 June 2016 - BBC News
summary: murder investigation launched after basildon stabbing .
police were called to market pavement at about 17:30 .
a man later died in hospital .
a 22-year-old man is being questioned on sus of murder .
more news , sport , weather and travel updates from 08:00 on thursday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: thanks for reading our live coverage on essex live today , here are the top stories we 've covered :
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 .
have a great evening .

documents.title: weather : heavy rain at times tonight
text: much of the evening will remain wet with heavy rain at times and strong winds , though the night it will turn drier and clearer from the north with winds gradually easing .
minimum temperature : 13c ( 55f ) .
after a bright start with some sunshine tomorrow , cloud will thicken through the day with showery outbreaks of rain through the afternoon .
get the latest forecast from bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: england captain alastair cook available for next essex match
text: division two side essex will have england captain alastair cook available for their next county championship match against kent .
the 31-year-old opener is to make his fifth championship appearance of the season in the game starting on sunday .
cook has not played cricket since england completed their 2-0 test series win over sri lanka on 13 june .
author: BBC Sport

documents.title: worry at surge in violent crime incidents involving young people
text: here 's a story that caught our eye in today 's echo .
the involvement of children and youths in a surge in violent crime is being held up as a `` frightening '' sign of the times .
read the full story here .

documents.title: firefighters clean-up 600kg a120 chemical spill
text: if you were passing on the a120 near stansted earlier , you might have seen a big clean-up operation after 600kg ( 1322lbs ) of ammonium nitrate leaked from a lorry .
essex fire and rescue says it was called to the scene at about 10:00 and it took them around about an hour to make the area safe again .
nobody was injured .

documents.title: dickenson and peter join colchester
text: dickenson and peter join colchester

documents.title: john baron - the conservative party 's leicester city ?
text: it 's expected that john baron , the mp for basildon and billericay , is going to put himself forward as a candidate for the next conservative leader .
however , the bookies are pretty certain he wo n't be david cameron 's successor .
although , i probably do n't need to remind you that leicester were 5000/1 to win the premier league at the start of last season , and look what happened there .

documents.title: praise for basildon somme memorial event from david cameron during pmqs
text: the prime minister has today praised a basildon-based project which commemorates the battle of the somme .
it 's after the conservative mp for south basildon and east thurrock , stephen metcalfe , asked david cameron to thank those involved in the forget never project during today 's pmq 's .
`` i commend all those organising these important events , particularly the event he mentions in his constituency '' , the prime minister said .

documents.title: 'it 's not safe here anymore ' residents speak after man stabbed to death in basildon
text: i 'm still in basildon where are man in his 20s was stabbed to death yesterday evening .
local residents have been telling me `` it 's not safe here anymore '' .
one lady , who wished to remain anonymous said : `` it 's horrible .
after everything that has gone on i do n't feel safe around here '' .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: mansfield sign southend 's hurst
text: mansfield sign southend 's hurst

documents.title: your from around the county
text: thanks to everybody who has uploaded their weather watcher today .
here 's a look at some of our favourites
author: BBC Weather Watchers

documents.title: man charged with sending offensive tweet to harlow mp robert halfon
text: a 21-year-old man has been charged with sending an offensive tweet to the conservative mp for harlow robert halfon (
the unemployed man from the town is accused of sending a message that was `` grossly offensive , or of an indecent , obscene or menacing character '' last thursday .
he 's due to appear at chelmsford magistrates ' court on 13 july .

documents.title: stansted airport evacuated after 'false alarm '
text: stansted airport was evacuated earlier this afternoon after a fire alarm was triggered .
passengers were temporarily forced to leave the terminal building - which has since reopened .
apologies for any inconvenience caused due to a recent fire alarm .
this was a false alarm and has now been stood down
that 's good news , not by a smoker i hope !

documents.title: weather : turning wet and windy later
text: if you 're heading out this afternoon , you might want to take a brolly .
rain will turn increasingly persistent through the afternoon , bringing drizzly outbreaks and some heavier bursts in places .
it 'll be windy too .
maximum temperature : 18c ( 64f ) .
get the latest forecast for your area from bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: striker midson makes braintree move
text: striker midson makes braintree move

documents.title: if you 're just joining us
text: a very good afternoon to you - here are the top stories we 've covered so far on essex live today :
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live

documents.title: douglas carswell trends on twitter
text: douglas carswell 's appearance in prime minister 's questions is getting people talking on twitter

documents.title: clacton mp jeered and booed during pmqs
text: douglas carswell , the ukip mp for clacton , was booed and jeered by mps during prime minister 's questions today as he called for both sides in the referendum campaign to help unite the country .
speaker steps in after mps jeer ukip mp who goes on to call for a new post-eu national consensus '' # pmqs
quite right to boo him .
he and his party represent everything that 's wrong with modern britain .
xenophobia , deceit , fear .
in your opinion .
i think you 're wrong .
ppl like u represent the extremist , divisive left views of today .
yeah .
extremist , divisive left views like tolerance , open-mindedness , unity and progressiveness .
if ur so tolerent and open-minded why dont you show it to the 52 % that voted leave .
ur a fraud .
tolerance means respecting the right to an opinion .
you do n't have to respect every opnion .
the contempt for democracy by mps that the people were even allowed a vote shines through - we voted out accept it deal with
@ twitterid those mps show us just how much they disrespect , and ignore , the will of the very people they rely on 4 votes .
@ twitterid sit down you fool , we 've voted out .
disgusting behaviour from mps who only moments before were banging on about intolerance and abuse .
vile and shocking
@ twitterid well , where exactly is your plan ?
you gave mislead and obfuscated , now we can see you can offer nothing
you are speaking nonsense martin .
well , where is the ukip plan ?
no sign yet is there ? the snp told the scots before the vote
point remains though that ukip are n't in government so ca n't enforce it .
so point is null .
not so simple they continually pushed for a solution yet have no idea what to do .
fools ?
the cons now think they are in control of brexit but there not , the people are watching & cons will pay high price if fumble
@ twitterid @ twitterid @ twitterid
carswell was a trojan horse .
he gas no.intemtion of sticking to.ukip.policy or promises but rather a tory line on immigr'n
disgusting behaviour .
more dignified behaviour in a school debating society .
all voices must be heard in a democracy
i think we 're finding out that a lot of people really dont believe in democracy or freedom of speech
i wonder what would happen if they called ge now ?
not that it 'll happen as parties in flux but fun to watch
lib dems would win with 48 % of the vote .
that is frightening
doubtful .
are they still a thing ?
lib dems campaigning on a platform of staying in eu .
remainers would vote for them .
52 % would not vote ukip
not saying all would vote ukip but i doubt they 'd go to the lib dems when they are n't dems anymore
i think there are so many who are unhappy with the result theyd vote for anyone offering what they want

documents.title: essex mps take to twitter to back boris johnson
text: today we begin to find out who 'll be in the running to become the next conservative leader .
a couple of the county 's mps have taken to twitter to show their support for boris johnson .
why i 'm backing @ twitterid as the next prime minister and conservative leader .
you 're a bit sad about boris ?
i 'm completely devastated that my career , my country has been fcuked so badly by # brexit
heaven help us
what will your reward for all the brown nosing & slashing fire brigade b if coco gets to b pm be james ?
do you think he really wanted to `` leave '' though ?
everything post referendum pts to him not enacting the result
oh .
wait .
this is serious ?
yes , it 's been the most destructive job application ever conducted .
whoops adaisy
you should jump ship and become a liberal democrat james , , , we may fuck up but at least we are honest .
you 'll have to find him first
you do n't think he 's right but that he 'll get you elected ?
do you not have some responsibility to the country ?
@ twitterid @ twitterid what will you be backing him for exactly a position in gove or may 's cabinet
shed tears over a clown
oh dear !
what historical re-enactment are we to be presented with next in this tory house of cards ?
or should that be tories vineyard ?
- whoops - a bit presumptuous !
seems we jumped the gun on that one
ah .
awkward .
what qualities did you see that others did n't ?
you 've gone too early
proud to say i will be backing @ twitterid to lead the conservative party and be our next prime minister .
did you check whether he still wants an airport in the estuary ?
your constituents might be interested # southend
you are just the worst mp .
that 's the beauty of getting our democracy back .
boris knows he will have to deliver
boris has shown himself to be a contemptable buffoon since brexit .
do n't know why you 'd back him .
beings as boris is no longer in the running , how about backing andrea leadson
wise choice .
turkey key country he part turkish .
mega diplomatic clout and deals aplenty with bojo

documents.title: bright idea ? light installed to prevent drivers misjudging the strood
text: the only road on and off mersea island has had a new gadget installed on it to help drivers avoid being caught out by high tides .
those familiar with the area will know that the strood periodically floods at high tide .
but now , essex county council has had a bright idea and installed a light which switches on when flood water covers the road .
it 's hoped it will help drivers judge whether the road is safe to cross

documents.title: army and navy flyover closed again
text: ongoing - chelmsford - army & navy flyover closed for maintenance works .
how long is it closed for ?

documents.title: market trader saw basildon stab victim 'lying on the ground '
text: back now to our top story this morning and people in basildon town centre have been describing their sadness at death of a young man found stabbed in this busy shopping area , near the bus station , late yesterday afternoon .
one market trader close to the scene told me he saw the victim lying on the ground being tended to by the emergency services .
a large police cordon has been taken away - and while detectives continue to investigate there 's now no outward sign a man was killed here .
author: Richard Smith
BBC Essex

documents.title: an apology from essex county council over last night 's chelmsford traffic chaos
text: in the words of justin bieber , is it too late now to say sorry ?
apologies to drivers who experienced delays in chelmsford last night .
this was due to vital road surfacing work
how long will the resurfacing take ?
as there was no warning yesterday

documents.title: canvey gp surgery closed with immediate effect after serious concerns from cqc
text: a gp surgery on canvey island has been closed with immediate effect following serious concerns from health watchdog the care quality commission ( cqc ) .

it 's not yet clear why action has been taken against the grafton surgery on long road , and we may not be able to find out much more for now as the cqc says it ca n't comment for legal reasons , but we 'll keep trying .
health bosses say patient safety is paramount and their priority is to minimise any disruption .
on the surgery 's website it says oaklands surgery will see patients instead .

documents.title: john baron gets a thumbs up from basilon council leader
text: in order for john baron to get on the ballot paper for the tory leadership , he would need the backing of two fellow mps .
one man who certainly think 's he 's up for the task is the conservative leader of basildon council .
phil turner said mr baron , basildon and billericay mp , is `` well respected '' among his peers .
we get caught up on the people that we see on our television and we tend to focus on them as the front runners there 's a lot of peers behind him and pushing him to put his name forward . ''

documents.title: an essex prime minister ?
text: could the next conservative leader be from essex ?
basildon and billiercay mp john baron is currently considering going for the job .
he is weighing up his options and says he wants to stand to ensure that the eu referendum decision is honoured .
mr baron needs to make up his mind soonish though .
nominations are opening today but close at midday tomorrow .
latest : brexit , labour and tory leadership

documents.title: basildon police cordon removed after man stabbed to death
text: business is returning to normal in market pavement , basildon , after a man , believed to be in his 20s , was stabbed to death here yesterday evening .
a police cordon that was in place has now been lifted .

documents.title: army and navy flyover finally reopens after last night 's rush hour misery
text: if you tried to get out of chelmsford during rush hour yesterday evening , chances are it took you a lot longer than normal .
the flyover was closed for emergency repairs , causing misery for motorists as the city came to a standstill .
it reopened about 30 minutes ago , but traffic remains slow .
you 'll find the latest travel updates here .

documents.title: basildon murder investigation : what we know so far
text: detectives launched a murder investigation last night after a man , believed to be in his 20s , was stabbed to death in basildon .
the victim was found injured on market pavement at about 17:30 .
he was airlifted to hospital where he later died .
a 22-year-old man from basildon was arrested near the scene .

documents.title: man , 22 , continuing to be questioned by police on sus of murder
text: essex police says it is continuing to question a 22-year-old man on sus of murder .
he was arrested by officers shortly after a man was stabbed to death in basildon .
we 'll bring you more updates on this story as we get them .
author: Sonia Watson
BBC Essex

documents.title: welcome to essex live
text: hello and welcome to essex live .
a murder investigation is under way this morning following a fatal stabbing in basildon yesterday evening .
more on that shortly .
author: Jack Warren
BBC Local Live
